messages.subject: TV, etc.
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks to everyone who responded about the TV question -- very helpful! Yes, I ve let go of my TV=Evil concept -- was really more about trying to be the best
messages.messageBody:
Thanks to everyone who responded about the TV question -- very helpful!

Yes, I've let go of my TV=Evil concept -- was really more about trying to be the "best" parent, and buying into fears. (It seems like our society's expectations are that you have to be fearful to be a good parent -- what a crock!)

I'll check out the TIVO thing -- it's all new to me.

I am so enjoying all these parenting discussions. Thanks so much to all of you for contributing.

Karen


---------------------------------
